title: Own Your Own Home For LESS Than What You Are Paying in Rent!
description: *Don't miss out on our $1000 move-in special*

Say goodbye to rent increases and limited privacy. We are making homeownership both easy and affordable for you. We work with all credit types and budgets and have several floor plans for you to choose from!
Community Pools, Stocked Ponds, Playgrounds, and Parks
ONLY $999 Per Month* - No security deposits or hidden fees!!!

**P & I. Price $217,900, 3.75% Fixed/4.849% APR, 3.5% Down, FHA 30 Year, OAC from third party lender. Other fees such as taxes, insurance, and HOA fees are not included in the sample monthly payment amount. Prices and rates are subject to change without notice.
Easy commute to Dallas, Rockwall, Garland, Heath, Mesquite, Plano, Terrell, and Balch Springs.

title: Modern Apartments Accept Misdemeanors and Felony - Second Chance!
description: Are you searching for the best in modern luxurious style that caters to you and your needs?
Are you a second chance client that just feels helpless about where to go?
Work with us, Texas Apartment Experts.
INCOME: Must make 3x the rent in monthly income or have a co-signer. We cannot help with low income, Section 8, disability, SSI, etc. We work with all price ranges.
Our service is completely FREE to you!
STOP wasting time and money and start working with us today!

We have access to apartment properties rental criteria so we can show you exactly what they will and won't accept. Plus we have years of experience and knowledge that we will share with you so that you may make the best choice possible. Call us today at

We work with low credit, bad credit, broken leases, misdemeanors, evictions, felonies, bankruptcies, foreclosures, co-signers, income-restricted. Most apartments look at your entire history no matter how old. Just let us know what you and we will connect you with a place you can call home.
Give us a call, and stop wasting time and money!

title: GRAND TWO-BEDROOM APARTMENT WITH GRANITE COUNTERTOPS
description: Oaks 5th Street Crossing at City Center
Live in the Center of it All!

Oaks 5th Street Crossing at City Center invites you to drop by and tour the studio, one-, and two-bedroom models now available. Open-style layouts with wood-style flooring, neutral finishes, and contemporary lighting create modern interiors. Kitchens look fabulous with stainless steel appliances and granite countertops, as well as chef’s islands or breakfast bars available in select homes. Many floor plans have patios or balconies while some feature studies. Most models also have laundry rooms equipped with full-size washers and dryers. For added convenience, numerous floor plans have walk-in closets. Some master bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms as well. Oaks 5th Street Crossing at City Center is a gated, four-story community. Luxer One lockers and a Wi-Fi lounge are available. For leisure, take advantage of the fitness center, swimming pool, and theater room. The community welcomes pets and even offers a green space. Speak with the leasing team for your inquiries.
* Outdoor Swimming Pool at Building Across the Street

The community’s perfect business district location puts you within a short walk of shopping and tons of tasty local restaurants, plus the DART is just minutes away.
